title: Soldier with Feathered Hat, from "La Noblesse de Lorraine" (verso)
marks:
Inscription

LLC, in the print, in black: [Callo
description: standing man with long hair, beard and moustache, wearing a feathered hat, ruffled collar and boots with spurs; tiny horses and figures in LLC and LRC; affixed to the ULC on back of drawing
creditline: Gift of the Joseph F. McCrindle Collection
